Module FYPManager
Package controllers

Class FacultyProjectManager

java.lang.Object
controllers.FacultyProjectManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFacultyProjectManager
public class FacultyProjectManager extends Object implements IFacultyProjectManager
This class is the manager for the faculty projects. It implements the IFacultyProjectManager interface.
